document.title: Extract from Modifications to the Aesop's Fable Paradigm Change New Caledonian Crow Performances
document.citation: Logan CJ, Jelbert SA, Breen AJ, Gray RD, Taylor AH (2014) Modifications to the Aesop's Fable Paradigm Change New Caledonian Crow Performances. PLoS ONE 9(7): e103049. doi:10.1371/journal.pone.0103049 Retrieved from http://journals.plos.org/plosone/article?id=10.1371/journal.pone.0103049 on 07 Dec 2016
document.body: While previous work has suggested that New Caledonian crows [13], like Eurasian jays [18], and children under 7 years of age [16], cannot solve the U-tube task, here one crow, Kitty, was able to do so by learning the connection between the arbitrary color cue and the movement of the food.
